mapper.select: select rownum, tbl.* from (select * from tbl_board where board_class = #{board_class} order by board_sn desc ) tbl where rownum <= #{list_cnt_many} order by rownum
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (member_id, board_title, board_content, board_class) values (#{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title}, #{content}, 'vs')
mapper.select: select * from tbl_board where member_id=#{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}} and board_title=#{title} and board_content = #{content}
